content.query:
------------------------------
------CREATE MASTER KEY-------
------------------------------
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD ='0326@Farhan'

------------------------------
-- DATABASE SCOPE CREDENTIAL--
------------------------------

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL farhan_creds
WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity'


------------------------------
-----EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE-----
------------------------------

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE silver_source
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'https://azuredatawarehousepro.dfs.core.windows.net/silver/',
    CREDENTIAL = farhan_creds
)

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE gold_source
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'https://azuredatawarehousepro.dfs.core.windows.net/gold/',
    CREDENTIAL = farhan_creds
)

------------------------------
-----EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT-----
------------------------------

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquet_format
WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET,
    DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT delta_format
WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA
)
